Title: Make Monthly Constituent Calls
Description: Make phone calls to elected representatives for 6 consecutive months
Completion Criteria: At least 1 call/month for 6 months

Title: Build a Relationship with Legislative Staff
Description: Have 3+ substantive interactions with the same staff member over 6 months
Completion Criteria: 3+ interactions (calls - meetings - detailed correspondence)

Title: Contribute to Social Impact Open Source
Description: Make 3+ meaningful contributions (code and documentation and issues) to open source projects serving social good
Completion Criteria: 3+ meaningful contributions made

Title: Create a 24-Hour Time-Lapse Video
Description: Record a continuous 24-hour period and compile into a time-lapse video
Completion Criteria: Final video showing full day-night cycle from fixed position

Title: 30-Day Daily Photo Challenge
Description: Take one intentional creative photo every day for 30 consecutive days
Completion Criteria: Collection of 30 photos each from different day with distinct theme

Title: Record a One-Second-a-Day Video Diary
Description: Film one second of video every day for 90 days and then compile
Completion Criteria: Final compiled video of 90 seconds showing 90 different days

Title: Handwrite 10 Gratitude Letters
Description: Write and send 10 handwritten letters(or email if you dont have their address) to people who have positively impacted your life
Completion Criteria: 10 separate handwritten letters - actually delivered

Title: Bake 10 Unique Recipes in 48 Hours
Description: Make 10 different baked goods or cooked dishes in one weekend
Completion Criteria: 10 distinct recipes - completed within 48 hours - photo documentation

Title: Blindfolded Candy Chopstick Challenge
Description: Blindfolded and pick up and eat as many M&Ms as you can using only chopsticks in 60 seconds (competitive)
Completion Criteria: Video documenting attempt with final count

Title: Balance Spoons on Your Face
Description: Balance as many spoons as possible on your face simultaneously. Competitive challenge
Completion Criteria: Photo showing all spoons balanced at once (no adhesive)

Title: Blow a Giant Bubblegum Bubble
Description: Blow the largest bubblegum bubble you can (competitive)
Completion Criteria: Photo or video of largest bubble with something for scale

Title: Eat Beans with a Toothpick
Description: Eat as many baked beans as possible in 60 seconds using only a toothpick (competitive)
Completion Criteria: Video of attempt with final count (one bean at a time speared)

Title: Build Something Useful from Scrap
Description: Create a functional object using only materials you already have or can get for free
Completion Criteria: Object serves real purpose - made from repurposed materials - photo in use

Title: Hometown Tourist
Description: Spend a full day exploring your own area as if you were a visitor. Ask locals for highlights. Visit landmarks
Completion Criteria: Visited at least 3 spots you'd never been to before

Title: Solo Navigation
Description: Travel somewhere unfamiliar alone and navigate without GPS
Completion Criteria: Solo trip completed using maps - signs - or asking locals

Title: Festival Immersion
Description: Attend a cultural celebration or community event outside your usual circle
Completion Criteria: Participated (not just observed) in at least one activity

Title: Learn One Song
Description: Learn to play or sing one complete song
Completion Criteria: Can perform it start to finish for at least one person

Title: Cook Something New
Description: Prepare a dish from a cuisine you've never cooked before
Completion Criteria: Eaten the finished dish

Title: Produce Media
Description: Create a podcast episode
Completion Criteria: Finished product shared with at least one person

Title: Meet Someone New
Description: Attend an event where you know few/no people and start a genuine conversation
Completion Criteria: Exchanged contact info or made plans to meet again

Title: Day of Yes
Description: Let someone else plan a full day for you and participate in everything they choose
Completion Criteria: Completed entire day as planned by them

Title: Mentor Someone
Description: Regularly guide someone less experienced in an area you know for at least 4 meetings
Completion Criteria: Met with them at least 4 times and they've made progress

Title: Shadow Someone in Another Career
Description: Spend half a day+ observing someone in a field you're curious about
Completion Criteria: Shadow completed + written reflection

Title: Ask Out Someone Who Intimidates You
Description: Ask someone on a date who you're genuinely interested in but nervous about
Completion Criteria: The ask happened (outcome irrelevant)

Title: Say I Love You to 5 New People
Description: Tell five people you genuinely love that you love them - people you've never said it to before
Completion Criteria: All 5 documented (who and when)

Title: Go Car-Free for One Month
Description: Complete 30 consecutive days without driving a personal vehicle
Completion Criteria: 30 days completed (emergency/accessibility exceptions allowed)

Title: Switch to Renewable Electricity
Description: Switch your home to a renewable energy provider/green tariff or install any solar capacity
Completion Criteria: Switch confirmed or solar installed

Title: Take Cold Showers for 30 Days
Description: Replace your regular shower with a cold shower every day for 30 consecutive days
Completion Criteria: 30 days without missing (no warm-up period allowed)

Title: Learn to Do the Splits
Description: Achieve a full front or side split through daily stretching
Completion Criteria: Photo showing hips flat on ground in full split

Title: Make a One-Person Short Film
Description: Write and film and edit a short film where you handle every role
Completion Criteria: Minimum 2 minutes - has script - you appear on screen - you edited it

Title: Fold 100 Origami Cranes
Description: Fold 100 paper cranes
Completion Criteria: Photo of 100 completed cranes together

Title: Compliment 100 Strangers
Description: Give 100 genuine compliments to people you don't know (in-person face-to-face)
Completion Criteria: 100 compliments delivered to strangers

Title: Memorize 50 Digits of Pi
Description: Memorize and recite 50 digits of pi from memory
Completion Criteria: Recite 3.14159... through 50 decimal places without reference

Title: Learn Basic Sign Language
Description: Learn the ASL alphabet and 20 common phrases
Completion Criteria: Fingerspell full alphabet from memory + sign 20 phrases without reference

Title: Learn Morse Code and Send a Message
Description: Memorize Morse code and use it to send a real message
Completion Criteria: Encode 10+ word sentence - transmit it (tapping - flashlight - sound)

Title: Use Your Non-Dominant Hand for a Day
Description: Use only your non-dominant hand for all tasks for one full waking day
Completion Criteria: All hand-based tasks done with non-dominant hand (eating - writing - opening doors)

Title: Solve a Rubik's Cube
Description: Solve a Rubik's Cube from a fully scrambled state
Completion Criteria: Complete solve without looking up algorithms during the solve

Title: Walk Every Street in Your Neighborhood
Description: Physically walk down every street within a defined area
Completion Criteria: Define boundary before starting - track on map - every street walked

Title: Spend a Day Blindfolded
Description: Experience a full waking day without sight
Completion Criteria: Wear blindfold from waking until bedtime (have someone nearby for safety)

Title: Most Clothespins on Your Face
Description: Clip as many clothespins to your face as possible in 60 seconds
Completion Criteria: Video of attempt with final count

Title: The Authentic Day
Description: Describe your perfect day given no outside obligations and then do it.
Completion Criteria: Day completed - logged what you did.

Title: Values Audit
Description: Write your top 10 values and make one small ongoing life change to better align with your values. https://qualitycharters.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Hiring-For-Fit_Values-List.pdf
Completion Criteria: 10 values written - change executed

Title: The Reconnection
Description: Message three friends you haven't contacted in 1+ year with personalized messages referencing specific memories
Completion Criteria: 3 personalized messages sent (not generic)

Title: The Protected Call
Description: Schedule a recurring monthly call with someone important and complete 3 consecutive months
Completion Criteria: 3 consecutive monthly calls completed

Title: Letter to the Living
Description: Write a letter to a living person expressing everything you'd want them to know if they were dying and deliver it
Completion Criteria: 1+ page letter written - delivered by mail or read aloud

Title: The Collision Dinner
Description: Host a meal introducing friends from different parts of your life who don't know each other
Completion Criteria: 3+ guests from 2+ different worlds - meal completed

Title: Specific Appreciation
Description: Tell 5 people what you specifically appreciate about them including a specific moment and how it affected you
Completion Criteria: 5 people told - each included specific moment + impact

Title: Family Recording
Description: Record an interview with a parent or elder about their life story
Completion Criteria: 10+ questions prepared - 20+ min recording completed - saved in 2 locations

Title: Use Your Time Off
Description: Take your full vacation/PTO this year or 10+ days if self-employed
Completion Criteria: All PTO scheduled - all PTO taken

Title: Enroll in One Course
Description: Enroll in and complete a course on something you've always wanted to learn
Completion Criteria: Enrolled - completed with certificate or final project

Title: 12 Books Outside Your Lane
Description: Read 12 books this year in subjects outside your normal interests
Completion Criteria: 12 books completed outside typical reading

Title: Find a Mentor
Description: Approach someone whose path you admire and ask for mentorship
Completion Criteria: Person identified - ask made - at least 3 meetings happened

Title: Apply Anyway
Description: Apply for an opportunity you think you're not ready for (job and grant and program)
Completion Criteria: Application submitted (rejection doesn't matter)

Title: The Old Apology
Description: Apologize for something you did years ago with a genuine apology that asks nothing in return
Completion Criteria: Apology delivered - asked for nothing in return

Title: Say I Love You
Description: Tell a family member I love you if you rarely do
Completion Criteria: Said it explicitly

Title: Time with Declining Health
Description: Spend meaningful time with someone whose health is declining (aging relative and hospice volunteer and care facility visit)
Completion Criteria: 3+ visits or sessions completed

Title: 30 Days Alcohol-Free
Description: Go 30 consecutive days without drinking
Completion Criteria: 30-day streak completed

Title: Sleep 8+ Hours for 14 Nights
Description: Get 8+ hours of actual sleep for two straight weeks
Completion Criteria: Sleep tracking data showing 14 consecutive nights

Title: Master 10 New Meals
Description: Learn to cook 10 nutritious meals without recipes
Completion Criteria: Photos of all 10 meals + can cook any on request

Title: Automate Retirement Savings
Description: Open a retirement account and set up automatic contributions
Completion Criteria: Account open + automatic transfer active

Title: Build an Emergency Fund
Description: Save enough to cover 1-3 months of essential expenses
Completion Criteria: Bank statement showing target balance reached

Title: Complete a Salary Negotiation
Description: Negotiate for more compensation in current role or new offer
Completion Criteria: The negotiation conversation happened

Title: The Money Talk with Parents
Description: Direct conversation with parents about their financial situation and estate plans and wishes
Completion Criteria: Conversation happened + can answer basic questions about their situation

Title: Pitch an Idea to Leadership
Description: Prepare and deliver a formal proposal to senior leadership
Completion Criteria: The pitch meeting happened

Title: Digital Detox Day
Description: Spend 24 hours without phones computers or internet
Completion Criteria: Full 24 hours passed

Title: Don't Speak for 48 Hours
Description: Go 48 consecutive hours without speaking a single word and otherwise going about your normal routine
Completion Criteria: 48 hours completed with zero spoken words

Title: 12-Hour Meditation in Your Room
Description: Complete 12 hours of meditation in a single day without leaving your room
Completion Criteria: 12 hours completed

Title: Meet a Family Member You've Never Spoken To
Description: Reach out to and have a meaningful conversation with a family member you've never actually talked to before
Completion Criteria: Contact made - real conversation happened

Title: Start a Business and Make $100 Profit
Description: Create a new business venture and generate at least $100 in actual revenue
Completion Criteria: $100 revenue documented (revenue minus all costs)

Title: Write a Song
Description: Compose an original song with lyrics and melody (instrument optional and can be a cappella)
Completion Criteria: Complete song exists that you can perform start to finish

Title: Wear Shoes on Wrong Feet for Entire Day
Description: Wear your left shoe on your right foot and vice versa for an entire waking day
Completion Criteria: Full day completed without switching them back

Title: Meet Someone with Fake Identity
Description: Meet a stranger and maintain a completely fake identity and backstory for at least 10 minutes (bonus for accent - longer duration)
Completion Criteria: Conversation lasted 10+ min - they believed your fake identity

Title: Get Autograph from Famous Person
Description: Obtain an autograph from someone famous enough to have a Wikipedia page
Completion Criteria: Autograph obtained from person with Wikipedia page

Title: Attempt a Guinness World Record
Description: Make an official or documented attempt at any Guinness World Record
Completion Criteria: Good faith attempt documented (bonus points for actually achieving it)

Title: Get Best Free Item from Classifieds
Description: Find and claim the best free item you can from Craigslist/Facebook Marketplace/local classifieds
Completion Criteria: Free item obtained and photographed. Best item chosen by group vote.

Title: Run a Marathon
Description: Train for and complete a full 26.2 mile marathon
Completion Criteria: Finish time documented

Title: Gain or Lose 10 Pounds
Description: Reach a weight goal of gaining or losing 10 pounds (whichever aligns with your health goals)
Completion Criteria: Before and after weight documented

Title: Bike 100 Miles in One Day
Description: Complete a 100-mile bike ride in a single day
Completion Criteria: Route tracked showing 100+ miles

Title: Learn to Handstand
Description: Learn to hold a freestanding handstand
Completion Criteria: Video of handstand held for 10+ seconds without wall support

Title: Don't Shower for 5 Days
Description: Go 5 consecutive days without showering or bathing
Completion Criteria: 5 days completed

Title: Do a kickflip
Description: Learn to ride a skateboard and perform a kickflip
Completion Criteria: Video of doing a kickflip

Title: Bake Bread from Scratch
Description: Make a loaf of bread completely from scratch (no bread machine)
Completion Criteria: Edible loaf produced with photo

Title: Draw a Self-Portrait
Description: Create a self-portrait drawing or painting
Completion Criteria: Completed self-portrait

Title: Paint Something and Display It
Description: Create a painting and display it proudly somewhere in your home
Completion Criteria: Painting created and hung/displayed

Title: Take a Themed Photography Series
Description: Take a series of at least 10 photos around a specific theme
Completion Criteria: 10+ photos with cohesive theme

Title: Make Wholesome Graffiti
Description: Create positive/uplifting street art or chalk art in a public space
Completion Criteria: Photo of your wholesome public art

Title: Write a Poem
Description: Write an original poem of at least 12 lines
Completion Criteria: Poem written and shared with at least one person

Title: Write a Joke
Description: Write an original joke and tell it to at least 5 people
Completion Criteria: Joke written and delivered to 5+ people. Someone has to laugh.

Title: Learn 3 Magic Tricks
Description: Learn three different magic tricks well enough to perform them
Completion Criteria: Perform all 3 tricks for someone without them figuring them out

Title: Take a Dance Class
Description: Attend and complete a dance class in any style
Completion Criteria: Class completed

Title: Have Conversation with Oldest Living Relative
Description: Have a meaningful conversation with your oldest living relative about their life
Completion Criteria: Conversation happened and you learned something new about them

Title: Take Your Boss to Lunch
Description: Invite your boss to lunch and pay for it
Completion Criteria: Lunch happened and you paid

Title: Ask a stranger for $100
Description: Ask someone you dont know if you can have $100
Completion Criteria: The ask happened (outcome doesn't matter)

Title: Ask Someone for Clothing Item They're Wearing
Description: Notice something someone is wearing that you like and ask them to give it to you
Completion Criteria: The ask happened (getting it is bonus)

Title: Organize a Group Hike
Description: Plan and lead a hike with 4+ people
Completion Criteria: Hike completed with 4+ participants

Title: Go to a Protest or Rally
Description: Attend a protest or rally for a political cause you care about
Completion Criteria: Attended and participated

Title: Speak in Accent for Entire Day
Description: Maintain a fake accent for an entire day in all interactions
Completion Criteria: Full day completed without breaking character

Title: Wear Costume in Public on Non-Halloween Day
Description: Wear a full costume in public on a regular day (not Halloween or costume event)
Completion Criteria: Wore costume for significant public outing

Title: Collect Hair from 10 People
Description: Collect a piece of hair from 10 different people (with their knowledge)
Completion Criteria: 10 hair samples collected with consent

Title: Buy Food from One Restaurant Eat in Another
Description: Purchase food from one restaurant and eat it inside a different restaurant
Completion Criteria: Completed without getting kicked out

Title: Visit 10 Coffee Shops in Your City
Description: Visit and order from 10 different coffee shops in your city
Completion Criteria: 10 shops visited with photos/receipts

Title: Get Photo from Highest and Lowest Points in City
Description: Take photos at both the highest and lowest elevation points in your city - including buildings and basements
Completion Criteria: Both photos taken with location proof

Title: Sneak Into an Event
Description: Get into an event you weren't invited to or don't have a ticket for
Completion Criteria: Successfully attended event you shouldn't have been at

Title: Commit a Very Small Crime
Description: Break an outdated or obscure law that's technically illegal but harmless
Completion Criteria: Document which weird law you broke

Title: Beat a Video Game You've Never Played
Description: Complete a video game from start to finish that you've never played before
Completion Criteria: Game completed with screenshot of ending

Title: Get a Wildly Different Hairstyle
Description: Get a dramatically different haircut or style than you normally have
Completion Criteria: Before and after photos

Title: Get a Tattoo
Description: Get a tattoo (any size)
Completion Criteria: Tattoo completed

Title: Give a tattoo
Description: Give someone a tattoo (any size)
Completion Criteria: Tattoo completed

Title: Buy Only Unfamiliar Groceries
Description: Buy a week's worth of groceries where nothing is something you've ever eaten before
Completion Criteria: Receipt showing unfamiliar items + photos of eating them

Title: Get Pushed Around in a Wheelbarrow
Description: Get pushed around in a wheelbarrow in public for at least 10 minutes
Completion Criteria: Photo/video evidence of wheelbarrow ride

Title: Do a Street Performance
Description: Perform publicly on a street (music/magic/art/dance) until you make money
Completion Criteria: Performance completed with photo/video

Title: See and Document 20 Bird Species
Description: Observe and photograph/document 20 different bird species
Completion Criteria: 20 species documented with photos or detailed notes

Title: Learn to Swim
Description: Learn to swim if you can't already (complete a lap without stopping)
Completion Criteria: Swim one full pool length without stopping

Title: Appear in Video from 100k+ Follower Account
Description: Appear in a YouTube/Instagram/TikTok video from an account with 100k+ followers - or live TV
Completion Criteria: Link to video showing you on major account

Title: Hitchhike Somewhere
Description: Travel somewhere by hitchhiking with a buddy
Completion Criteria: Reached destination via hitchhiking

Title: Reach Conversational Level in New Language
Description: Learn enough to hold a 15-minute conversation with a native speaker
Completion Criteria: Verified conversation with native speaker completed

Title: See Sunrise and Sunset in One Day
Description: Intentionally watch both the sunrise and sunset on the same day. Ideally from somewhere with a view.
Completion Criteria: Present and watching during both events on same calendar day

Title: Cook a Full Meal Together Blindfolded
Description: Partner up and cook a complete meal where one person is blindfolded and the other can only give verbal instructions
Completion Criteria: Completed meal with photo and video of the process

Title: Learn a Partner Dance Routine
Description: Learn and perform a choreographed partner dance (salsa - bachata - swing - etc.) of at least 1 minute
Completion Criteria: Performed routine of 1+ minute with video evidence

Title: Complete a Tandem Bike Ride of 20+ Miles
Description: Ride a tandem bicycle with a partner for at least 20 miles in one outing
Completion Criteria: GPS tracked ride of 20+ miles completed together

Title: Three-Legged 5K
Description: Complete a 5K race or route while three-legged-tied to a partner
Completion Criteria: 5K distance completed while tied together with photo/video

Title: Build a Piece of Furniture Together
Description: Build a functional piece of furniture from raw materials (not IKEA) with a partner
Completion Criteria: Functional furniture piece completed with photo in use

Title: Volunteer Together for 8 Hours
Description: Complete a full day of volunteer work (8+ hours) with a friend at the same organization
Completion Criteria: 8+ hours completed at same organization with photo

Title: Forage a Meal Together
Description: Find and correctly identify wild edible plants/mushrooms with a knowledgeable partner and eat a dish made from them
Completion Criteria: Dish prepared and eaten from foraged ingredients with photo documentation

Title: Canoe or Kayak 10+ Miles Together
Description: Complete a 10+ mile paddle with a partner in a single outing
Completion Criteria: 10+ mile paddle completed together with GPS or photo evidence

Title: Build and Launch a Model Rocket Together
Description: Assemble and successfully launch a model rocket with a partner
Completion Criteria: Rocket assembled and successfully launched with video

Title: Best Sandcastle
Description: Build sandcastles at the same beach on the same day; group votes on the best
Completion Criteria: Sandcastles built and winner voted on with photos

Title: Karaoke Night
Description: Perform karaoke at a bar or public venue in front of an audience of strangers
Completion Criteria: Video or photo of you performing karaoke at a public venue

Title: Donate Clothes to a Shelter
Description: Gather clothes you no longer wear and donate them directly to a homeless shelter or clothing bank
Completion Criteria: Donation made with receipt or photo at the shelter

Title: Cook a Meal for a Stranger
Description: Prepare a homemade meal and share it with someone you don't know personally
Completion Criteria: Meal prepared and shared with a stranger - with photo

Title: Get in Your Local Newspaper
Description: Do something noteworthy enough to be mentioned or featured in your local newspaper or news outlet
Completion Criteria: Published article or mention with your name

Title: Visit Another Player in Their City
Description: Travel to visit another Big Year participant in their home city and spend meaningful time together.
Completion Criteria: Photo together in their city

Title: Learn to Ride a Unicycle
Description: Learn to ride a unicycle well enough to travel at least 50 feet without falling
Completion Criteria: Video of riding 50+ feet unassisted

Title: Quit an Addiction
Description: Identify a habit or substance you're dependent on and quit for at least 3 consecutive months
Completion Criteria: 3 consecutive months free from the identified habit

Title: Write a Children's Book
Description: Write and illustrate a children's book about something you're passionate about
Completion Criteria: Completed book with text and illustrations - at least 10 pages

Title: Start a Podcast or YouTube Channel
Description: Create a podcast or YouTube channel and publish at least 3 episodes or videos
Completion Criteria: 3+ episodes/videos published publicly

Title: Hold an Unfamiliar Animal
Description: Physically interact with or hold an animal species you've never touched before (reptile - bird of prey - tarantula - etc.)
Completion Criteria: Photo or video of you with the new animal species

Title: Try a Combat Sport
Description: Attend at least 3 classes in a combat sport you've never trained (boxing - jiu jitsu - muay thai - wrestling - etc.)
Completion Criteria: 3 classes completed in a new combat sport

Title: Sunrise to Sunset Outdoors
Description: Spend an entire day from sunrise to sunset outdoors without going inside for any reason
Completion Criteria: Full day completed outdoors with no indoor visits

Title: Delete a Social Media Account
Description: Permanently delete one of your social media accounts (Instagram - TikTok - Twitter - Facebook - etc.)
Completion Criteria: Account permanently deleted (not just deactivated)

Title: Go on a Meditation Retreat
Description: Attend a meditation or mindfulness retreat of at least 2 days
Completion Criteria: Retreat attended for full duration

Title: Make a New Close Friend
Description: Develop a genuine friendship with someone new. Spend meaningful one-on-one time together at least 5 times.
Completion Criteria: 5+ hangouts with someone you weren't friends with at the start of the year

Title: Talk with an Unhoused Person
Description: Have a genuine - extended conversation with an unhoused person. Learn their name - hear their story - and share yours.
Completion Criteria: Had a real conversation and can share what you learned about their story

Title: Coffee Chat with a Stranger
Description: Approach strangers and ask them to have coffee with you until someone says yes - then have a genuine conversation
Completion Criteria: Coffee purchased and real conversation had with a stranger who accepted

Title: Take a Long-Distance Train Ride
Description: Ride Amtrak or equivalent train to a destination more than 12 hours away
Completion Criteria: Train ticket and photos from 12+ hour journey

Title: Write a Novel
Description: Write an original novel or novella of at least 50000 words
Completion Criteria: Completed manuscript of 50000+ words

Title: Guerrilla Garden
Description: Plant edible vegetables or herbs in a public space (park - unused lot - grocery store flower bed) and harvest the produce later
Completion Criteria: Plants planted in public space - grown - and produce harvested with photos

Title: High Five 100 Strangers
Description: Get 100 different strangers to high five you in a single day
Completion Criteria: Video evidence of high-fiving 100+ strangers

Title: No Eating Out for a Month
Description: Prepare every meal at home for 30 consecutive days. No restaurants or takeout or delivery.
Completion Criteria: 30 consecutive days with only home-cooked meals

Title: Go Skydiving
Description: Complete a tandem or solo skydive from at least 10000 feet
Completion Criteria: Jump completed with photo or video

Title: Try a Sensory Deprivation Tank
Description: Spend at least 60 minutes floating in a sensory deprivation tank
Completion Criteria: 60+ minute float session completed

Title: Pay for the Person Behind You
Description: Pay the bill of the person behind you in line at the grocery store
Completion Criteria: Payment made for a stranger's order

Title: Join a Sports League
Description: Join and complete a season in a recreational sports league (basketball - soccer - volleyball - kickball - etc.)
Completion Criteria: Full season completed in a recreational league

Title: Go Vegan for a Month
Description: Eat a fully vegan diet with no animal products for 30 consecutive days
Completion Criteria: 30 consecutive days of fully vegan eating

Title: Drive a Very Large Vehicle
Description: Get behind the wheel and drive a bus - semi truck - garbage truck - or other commercial-sized vehicle
Completion Criteria: Photo or video of you driving the vehicle

Title: Capture an Invasive Species
Description: Legally capture or remove an invasive species in your area (spotted lanternfly - invasive plants - etc.)
Completion Criteria: Photo of captured/removed invasive species with identification

Title: Track a Metric and Present It
Description: Choose a personal metric (mood - sleep - spending - steps - etc.) - track it daily for at least 6 months - and give a presentation on your findings
Completion Criteria: 6 months of data collected and presentation delivered to an audience

Title: Put an App on the App Store
Description: Build and publish a mobile app on the Apple App Store or Google Play Store
Completion Criteria: App live and downloadable with link

Title: Learn to Do a Backflip
Description: Learn to perform a standing backflip on flat ground (gym training allowed during learning)
Completion Criteria: Video of a standing backflip on flat ground

Title: Visit Every National Park in Your State
Description: Visit every national park or national monument in your state
Completion Criteria: Photo at each location documented

Title: No Processed Sugar for a Month
Description: Cut out all processed sugar from your diet for 30 consecutive days. Natural sugars from whole fruit are allowed.
Completion Criteria: 30 consecutive days without processed sugar

Title: No Spending for a Week
Description: Go 7 consecutive days without spending any money at all. Pre-paid bills like rent and utilities are fine.

Title: Do Stand-Up Comedy at an Open Mic
Description: Write and perform an original stand-up comedy set at an open mic night
Completion Criteria: Performed a set at a real open mic night with video or photo

Title: Chug a Gallon of Milk
Description: Attempt to drink an entire gallon of milk in one sitting. Barfing is allowed.

Title: Do 50% More Pull-Ups
Description: Increase your max set of pull-ups by 50% compared to your starting number (e.g. - 10 to 15)
Completion Criteria: Before and after max pull-up counts documented

Title: Convince a Wealthy Person to Donate
Description: Convince someone with a $10M+ net worth to make a donation to one of your favorite charities

Title: Start a Nonprofit
Description: Start a registered nonprofit organization and raise at least $1000 in donations
Completion Criteria: Nonprofit registered and $1000+ in donations received

Title: Go to a Drag Show in Drag
Description: Attend a drag show while dressed in full drag yourself
Completion Criteria: Photo of you in drag at a drag show

Title: Have Conversation with Your 1st Grade Teacher
Description: Track down and have a real conversation with your first grade (or other early) teacher
Completion Criteria: Conversation happened and you can describe what you discussed

Title: Take a Random Stranger to Lunch
Description: Invite a complete stranger off the street to have lunch with you - you pay.
Completion Criteria: Lunch completed with a stranger who accepted your invitation

Title: Test Drive a Luxury Car
Description: Go to a dealership and test drive a car worth $100000+ (Lamborghini or Porsche or similar)
Completion Criteria: Photo of you behind the wheel of the luxury car

Title: Dance the Thriller
Description: Organize and perform the Thriller dance with a group of 10+ people in a public place
Completion Criteria: Video of 10+ people performing Thriller together

Title: Learn to Windmill
Description: Learn the breakdancing windmill move well enough to complete 3 consecutive rotations
Completion Criteria: Video of 3+ consecutive windmill rotations

Title: Let 10 Species Eat from Your Hand
Description: Feed animals from 10 different species directly from your hand (squirrels - birds - goats - horses - etc.)
Completion Criteria: Photos of 10 different species eating from your hand

Title: See Inside a Datacenter
Description: Get a tour of or access to a datacenter and see the servers in person
Completion Criteria: Photo of you inside a datacenter

Title: Frugal Month and Donate Savings
Description: Remove as many expenses as you can for a full month (eat out less - cancel subscriptions - bike instead of Uber) and donate all the money you saved

Title: Get Kicked Out of a Casino for Card Counting
Description: Learn basic card counting and get asked to leave a casino for winning too much at blackjack

Title: Build a Tire Swing
Description: Build a functional tire swing from scratch and swing on it
Completion Criteria: Photo/video of completed tire swing in use

Title: Build a Treehouse
Description: Build a treehouse or elevated platform sturdy enough to sit in
Completion Criteria: Photo of completed treehouse with you sitting in it

Title: Plant a Fruit Tree
Description: Plant a fruit-bearing tree and keep it alive for one full year
Completion Criteria: Photo of tree at planting and one year later - still alive

Title: Tread Water for 2 Hours
Description: Stay afloat treading water continuously for 2 hours without touching the bottom or sides

Title: Learn to Surf
Description: Stand up and ride a wave to shore on a surfboard
Completion Criteria: Video of standing up and riding a wave

Title: Catch a Fish Bare-Handed
Description: Catch a live fish using only your hands (no tools nets or traps) and release it
Completion Criteria: Video of catching and releasing the fish

Title: Breathe Fire
Description: Learn fire breathing and successfully perform it (with proper fuel and technique)

Title: Learn to Do the Worm
Description: Learn the worm dance move well enough to travel at least 10 feet across the floor

Title: Learn to Moonwalk
Description: Learn to moonwalk smoothly enough to do it across a room without stumbling

Title: Shit Outside
Description: Successfully take a shit outdoors in nature (Leave No Trace principles apply)
Completion Criteria: Task completed following Leave No Trace principles

Title: Stretch Every Day for 30 Days
Description: Complete a dedicated stretching session of 10+ minutes every day for 30 consecutive days
Completion Criteria: 30 consecutive days logged with 10+ min sessions

Title: Practice Tai Chi for 30 Days
Description: Follow a Tai Chi routine at least 3 times per week for 30 consecutive days
Completion Criteria: 3x/week for 30 days documented

Title: Create a Piece of Pottery
Description: Shape and fire a piece of pottery using real clay (wheel or hand-built)
Completion Criteria: Finished fired pottery piece

Title: Make a Voodoo Doll
Description: Craft a handmade voodoo doll or poppet using fabric pins and stuffing
Completion Criteria: Completed doll with photo documentation

Title: Build a Giant Slingshot and Launch a Watermelon
Description: Construct a slingshot large enough to launch a watermelon and successfully fire one
Completion Criteria: Video of watermelon launch from completed slingshot

Title: Build and Maintain a Terrarium
Description: Build a terrarium housing live creatures (isopods snails etc.) and keep it thriving for 90 days
Completion Criteria: Terrarium built with living inhabitants thriving at 90 days

Title: Learn Balloon Animals
Description: Learn to make at least 5 distinct balloon animal shapes and make them for strangers in public
Completion Criteria: 5 shapes mastered + made for strangers in public with photo/video

Title: Create a Day of the Dead Altar
Description: Build a complete ofrenda honoring someone who has passed with traditional elements
Completion Criteria: Complete altar with traditional elements honoring specific person

Title: Grow a Meal from Seed to Plate
Description: Plant grow and harvest enough ingredients to cook a full meal where every ingredient (vegetables protein seasoning) was grown by you from seed
Completion Criteria: Full meal cooked with all ingredients grown from seed + documented

Title: Get a Pedicure with a Friend
Description: Book and attend a pedicure appointment together with a friend
Completion Criteria: Appointment attended together

Title: Apply Henna Art to Someone
Description: Learn henna application and complete a full henna design on another person's hand or arm
Completion Criteria: Completed design on another person with photo

Title: Attend a Holi Festival
Description: Attend and participate in a Holi festival (color festival)
Completion Criteria: Participated in color throwing + photo documentation

Title: Repaint and Redecorate a Room
Description: Fully repaint the walls and redecorate one room in your living space with new paint and rearranged or new decor
Completion Criteria: Room fully repainted and redecorated with before/after photos

Title: Learn to Change a Diaper
Description: Successfully change a real baby's diaper if you've never done it before
Completion Criteria: Diaper changed on a real baby

Title: Learn to Pick a Lock
Description: Learn to pick a lock using lockpicking tools and successfully open a locked padlock you own
Completion Criteria: Video of picking a locked padlock

Title: Switch to an Ergonomic Keyboard
Description: Purchase and switch to an ergonomic or split keyboard and use it as your primary keyboard for 30 days
Completion Criteria: 30 days of primary use documented

Title: Take an Emergency Preparedness Class
Description: Complete a certified class in CPR first aid or emergency response (e.g. Red Cross or community college)
Completion Criteria: Certificate or proof of class completion

Title: Hit a Bullseye with an Arrow
Description: Shoot an arrow and hit the bullseye on a standard archery target
Completion Criteria: Photo of arrow in bullseye

Title: Paint the Exterior of a Car
Description: Fully paint the exterior of a real car with original designs by hand (not a wrap not a spray booth)
Completion Criteria: Car fully painted by hand with photo documentation

Title: Create Chainsaw Art
Description: Carve a recognizable sculpture from wood or ice using a chainsaw
Completion Criteria: Completed sculpture with photo documentation

Title: Build a Backyard Raku Kiln
Description: Assemble a functional raku kiln in your backyard and fire at least one piece of pottery in it
Completion Criteria: Kiln built + at least one piece fired in it

Title: Wear Makeup Every Day for a Month
Description: Apply makeup every day for 30 consecutive days (if you don't normally wear it)
Completion Criteria: 30 days documented with photos

Title: Go Makeup-Free for a Month
Description: Go 30 consecutive days without wearing any makeup (if you normally wear it)
Completion Criteria: 30 consecutive days completed

Title: Dye Your Hair a Bold Color
Description: Dye your hair a dramatically different or bold color
Completion Criteria: Before and after photos of bold color

Title: Build a Bat House
Description: Build and install a functional bat house outdoors
Completion Criteria: Bat house built and installed outdoors

Title: Become a Beekeeper
Description: Set up a beehive and actively maintain a bee colony for at least 3 months
Completion Criteria: Hive set up + maintained for 3 months with documentation

Title: Build an Epic Blanket Fort
Description: Build a blanket fort large enough to sleep in and spend a full night in it
Completion Criteria: Fort built + full night spent inside with photo

Title: Install a Carbon Monoxide Detector
Description: Buy and properly install a carbon monoxide detector in your home
Completion Criteria: Detector installed and functioning

Title: Get a Radon Test Done
Description: Complete a radon test in your home and review the results
Completion Criteria: Test completed and results reviewed

Title: Eat 5 Different Insects
Description: Eat at least 5 different species of edible insects
Completion Criteria: 5 species eaten with photo/video documentation

Title: Eat a live insect
Description: Eat a large live insect or grub. 1 inch or larger
Completion Criteria: Video of eating a live insect 1 inch or larger

Title: Release a Lantern at a Festival
Description: Attend a lantern festival and release a sky lantern
Completion Criteria: Lantern released at festival with photo/video

Title: Learn Fencing and Win a Bout
Description: Take fencing lessons and win at least one bout in a sanctioned competition or tournament
Completion Criteria: Won at least one official bout with documentation

Title: Take someone on a sunrise picnic
Description: Prepare breakfast and watch the sunset together from somewhere beautiful.
Completion Criteria: Breakfast prepared + sunrise/sunset shared with someone + photo
